abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Public Expenditure
            Management Reform Project are to strengthen Venezuela's
            mechanisms of monitoring and control of public resources and
            to improve efficiency and accountability in public finance
            management. The six components are as follows: a)
            Deconcentration and decentralization of SIGECOF (Integrated
            System of Financial Management and Control of Public
            Finance); b) registry, administration, and control of
            non-financial; c) human resource financial management and
            control; d) planning and rationalization of public
            expenditure; e) institutional development and reform; and f)
            project management
